breathing_background_image_01.paragraph: Designing your own apartment is like cooking a meal: you can spend the evening preparing it yourself, or trust the professionals and enjoy a meal served by a chef.

icons.text: Innovative financing model, no down payment required
Purchase with invoice, no commission or PCC

offer_katowice_1.paragraph_01: The highest located apartment with a comfortable loggia for those who value uniqueness.

offer_katowice_2.paragraph_01: An apartment designed for those who want to take full advantage of Katowice on their own terms.

offer_katowice_3.paragraph_01: Your small home on the XIV floor, with a spacious living room with kitchen, office, bedroom, laundry room, walk-in closet, and a large storage room on the same floor.
offer_katowice_3.paragraph_02: Your oasis of tranquility in the heart of the city

offer_katowice_4.paragraph_01: A modern apartment for those who want everything within reach.

info_01.paragraph: We offer our clients ready-to-move-in premium apartments in the heart of Katowice, distinguished by timeless and versatile design combined with the latest technologies.

info_02.paragraph: The vision of Wnętrza Deweloperskie involves replicating highly refined design elements across a series of similar apartments, which helps maintain price competitiveness.

info_03.paragraph: The warranty covers all finishing work carried out by a professional construction team, as well as built-in furniture, lacquered surfaces, iFrame software, and electrical installations for car charging stations.

content.paragraph_2: Choose a unique location, where thousands of new apartments won’t be built, so you won’t have to compete with them on price when selling your property on the secondary market.
content.paragraph_3: Choose a corner apartment on the 15th floor of the timeless

text_plus_single_video_01.header_bottom: IN THE HEART OF THE CITY

info.paragraph: The decision to purchase real estate is one of the most important financial decisions of your life. Rely on the quality provided by a professional investor _ make your purchase based on a VAT invoice, with a full warranty on design work.
A premium apartment requires premium service, provided from start to finish by your assigned transaction advisor, who will handle all the formalities.
If you own another property, it can serve as your down payment for a mortgage. Don't let financial barriers stand in the way of investing in prestige.

text_plus_single_video_01.header_bottom: IN THE HEART OF THE CITY

info.paragraph: The decision to purchase real estate is one of the most important financial decisions of your life. Rely on the quality provided by a professional investor _ make your purchase based on a VAT invoice, with a full warranty on design work.
A premium apartment requires premium service, provided from start to finish by your assigned transaction advisor, who will handle all the formalities.
If you own another property, it can serve as your down payment for a mortgage. Don't let financial barriers stand in the way of investing in prestige.

texts: This new apartment combines modernity with elegance, creating a space ideal for those who value coherence and the highest standard.

From selected construction materials, through carefully chosen finishing details, to technologically advanced amenities – all this makes it more than just an apartment; it is a statement of top-class living.

info.paragraph: Our legal team will take care of all formalities and transaction security.
We will organize the entire purchase process for you and send the necessary documents.
We help obtain financing for the purchase, including options with no down payment.

texts: Every day, we spend up to 2.5 hours commuting to important places. Regain this time by always being on-site.

The tower features areas exclusively for residents - including a fitness center and spa. Your parking space will also be waiting for you. Within a short walk, you'll find a range of business centers, health, cultural, and shopping facilities. From this location, you'll find it easy to head wherever you want.

Footer_Common.paragraph_1: Wnętrza Deweloperskie is a trademark owned by: Deweloperskie P.S.A. with headquarters in Katowice at Murckowska 14c, NIP: 6343022518, REGON: 525018864 KRS: 0001030478
Footer_Common.paragraph_2: The offer includes luxurious apartments at the prestigious address: ul. Sokolska 30, Katowice. These apartments are located on the top floors of the Sokolska Towers building and are a competitive alternative to penthouse apartments in the Silesian real estate market.
